articles.title: iPhone 15 gets the biggest price drop on Flipkart - India Today
articles.description: The iPhone 15 is now available on Flipkart at a discounted price with additional bank offers and exchange deals, featuring a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, and a 48MP camera.
articles.content: With additional bank offers, the price can be reduced further to Rs 62,699, making it a Rs 17,201 discount from the original price of Rs 79,900.
